overview: Ms. Crawford brings over 30 years of experience in technology in the education market with a very successful track record for effectively orchestrating operations across the enterprise to achieve business objectives. Chris also has extensive experience in new product development, product life cycle management, marketing, and consulting. Chris has served in multiple VP-level roles at Sungard Higher Education and most recently was President and COO of AcademyOne before joining Schoolwires. Chris has a Master’s degree from Central Michigan University.
